html:
8.30.21  8:34 am   do you like existing?

      it's very confusing, but yes

8.30.21  5:49 am   I tend to procrastinate a lot, then I have a burst of creativity and start a lot of things. Then I get overwhelmed and I finish none of them and slip back into procrastination. I am scared I will achieve nothing as an artist that way. So my question is: if I were your friend, what would you say to me in this situation?

      you are going to feel better once you have proven to yourself that you can finish things. you can work with a list to collect ideas for finishing, but i think the big trick here is to put shorter things on the list. just to help push you over the finish line for a few items. once you have done this i think you will feel like a much more valid person, who can finish stuff

8.30.21  2:55 am   holy shit i JUST got the tempo down on this song i've been practicing on the drums for months (im pretty new) and it was so wild i felt like everything just clicked, like all these abstract concepts about like counting and shit just came together for me and became solid. have you ever had an experience like that when something you'd been working on just suddenly made sense?

     yes

     is there a good way to describe it?

      it's like seeing a map

8.30.21  1:44 am   what is the most perfect question in existence?

      each one is perfect the moment it is asked

8.30.21  1:06 am   what happens in the end /

      suddenly you understand the whole thing

8.29.21  11:55 pm   My friend and I are preparing for our first live concert. Have you noticed a difference between playing music live and playing music into a mic for a printed track?

     yes

      If so, what has the difference been?

     anything that anyone in the audience could ever imagine

     Should I be scared?

     sure. the only way to get through this is by doing it in front of actual people, many times. there's nothing else you can do to prepare for the actual live minds of every audience member. they won't even know what they think until you're both there in the room together

8.29.21  11:02 pm   what is your favourite day of the year?

      january 1

8.29.21  10:58 pm   i have heard a lot of rock music but i have never heard anything like this "rock organ" setting most keyboards seem to have. does any rock song have that sound in it??

     probably in the 1960s

8.29.21  10:36 pm   What's your favorite texture? 

      the checker texture, or as i call it, the chexture

8.29.21  10:17 pm   as a 21-year-old person who can spontaneously and unexpectedly imagine original songs in one's head - from a Western standpoint: melodies, harmonies, bass, rhythms, etc. - but cannot play a chordal instrument, what should i do? spend a decade trying to "play catch-up," mess around with a chordal instrument as a hobby, or just stick to virtual instruments?

     to play a 'virtual instrument', i'm almost certain you'll need to use some kind of piano keyboard to operate the instrument. so you might as well choose that one, because it is a gateway to all the instruments inside the computer, and also a chordal instrument itself

      i just want an efficient extension of my thoughts - not a tool to impress.

8.29.21  10:10 pm   is life just a big inside joke no one gets?

      that's one layer of the joke. the next layer is that everyone actually gets it

8.29.21  7:20 pm   How are Unicorns Made

      from a kernel. at a certain temperature the kernel pops and becomes a unicorn

8.29.21  6:40 pm   what is ur favorite game?

      what the heck is going on

8.29.21  6:23 pm   What's a thought you have that keeps occurring?

      it's possible to do stuff

8.29.21  5:31 pm   how long do your videos take to produce?

      10 seconds, plus 1 additional second to upload them

8.29.21  5:03 pm   how are you today?

      pretty good

8.29.21  5:01 pm   Can you explain the circle of fifths to me?

      all the notes are cousins. go up or down a 5th to see what note each note's cousins with

8.29.21  4:46 pm   how are you so amazing?

      i have a permit, which i have given to myself, because i am a licensed permit licensor, which is a license i have been also permitted to give myself

8.29.21  3:47 pm   what are you doing right now in terms of education

      inventing some new production strategies

8.29.21  3:17 pm   What's the difference between the note C and Do?

      could be anything

8.29.21  2:05 pm   is cheese ok?

      almost

8.29.21  12:47 pm   Is everything alright?

      some things are

8.29.21  12:30 pm   what is the best kind of tree

      each one is better than the others

8.29.21  11:37 am   how does a beginner to music start learning without paying for lessons

      you can be the teacher

8.29.21  11:05 am   Why are you so good

      that is part of an experiment, where i am experimenting with various different levels of quality

8.29.21  9:47 am   Aspirations? 

      how about this

8.29.21  9:17 am   Thoughts on Milk?

      i'm impressed by it

8.29.21  8:11 am   i like how i never know where your lyrics or the song in general is gonna go. Yet your familiar voice, instruments and harmonies are still there. Perfect balance between engaging and comforting. It is genuinely a pure delight listening to your work. My question is, are you real?

      oh that would be almost too convenient

8.29.21  7:00 am   How do you know about the world?

      this may seem like a weird trick, but if you sing about it you automatically learn about it

8.29.21  6:36 am   what do you do in real life

      try to understand it

8.29.21  3:50 am   would you agree that 6 letters is the perfect length for a word

      yes but other lengths are also perfect

8.29.21  3:32 am   How has my day been?

      pretty good

8.29.21  2:46 am   sometimes i do something and i'm bad at it, and it makes me so sad i stop doing the thing for a while. how do i break this tendency?

      make a compromise: do something easier, then also do the difficult thing 1 more time

8.29.21  1:35 am   should mondays be illegal

      the whole week should be illegal

8.29.21  1:17 am   What are you wearing?

      everything

8.29.21  12:18 am   I threw Swiss Cheese on the wall what do I do now?

      you have 3 choices: leave it there, take it off, or put more on

8.28.21  11:26 pm   Did you ever have to swiftly get away? 

      perhaps i do now

8.28.21  11:17 pm   what is the meaning of life

      connecting the dots, except they already are connected and you just have to prove it

8.28.21  11:15 pm   thoughts on the non-permanent tattoos that you put on with water

      i've never thought about them

8.28.21  9:23 pm   did you grow up wanting to become a musician or did that come later in your life

      earlier

8.28.21  9:24 pm   Is it possible to think just the right amount

      no

8.28.21  8:29 pm   hi bill, sorry this isn't a question but I would just like to say that I am a big fan of the next song you're going to release. thank you for producing it

      you're welcome

8.28.21  8:07 pm   am i too lazy

      no

8.28.21  7:11 pm   what is a human

      some sort of combination between an animal and a computer

8.28.21  6:56 pm   Do you watch Netflix 

      no

8.28.21  6:29 pm   In laymen's terms can you explain what is going on?

      yes

8.28.21  5:51 pm   what time is it?

      Sunday, August 29, 2021 5:10:30 AM

8.28.21  4:44 pm   Why can't i stop listening to "got some money"?

      could be the humidity

8.28.21  4:21 pm   If I call for help do you think I would get it

      yes

8.28.21  4:21 pm   how can i do something that means something

      try to do nothing that means nothing
